sentences.sContent: But if it is detraction, you might feel horrible, and you may self-deprecation.
sentences.sContent_eng: But if it is detraction, you might feel horrible, and you may self-deprecation.
sentences.sCn: 但如果那是诽谤，你会感觉很糟糕，你可能还会自我贬低。

remMethod.val: de(向下) + tract(拉， 拖) + ion → 向下拉 → 贬低

trans.tranOther: a person, thing, circumstance, etc, that detracts
